text: Ana ne nzuaim, Kornirius ana ŋgarkarav khaŋ nzuai, “Ena, bigɨn mueŋ nan hɨgim, fethɨgi rari vhɨzgi. Gu ruarɨmraar wo phenan kav, ra verav phuni khegene ndim, gu kav Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuav ki. Gu Fhe Bakɨme phorga nzuav kim, guma mbe shagi guigira hurgiap ŋgara gari, ana fhura hav, na nɨman mbar thɨgi.
